EmailTemplate.description: Notifying Mentee On Project Manager feedback cancellation when mentor complete KRA
EmailTemplate.name: Notifying Mentee On Project Manager feedback cancellation
EmailTemplate.subject: Performance: Feedback Record Canceled for the Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!PM_Configure__c.Mentee__c},
We hope this message finds you well.
This is to inform you that, unfortunately, {!PM_Configure__c.Reporting_Contact__c} of Project {!PM_Configure__c.Project_Name__c} was unable to submit your KRA feedback by the designated deadline. As a result, his/her feedback record has been automatically canceled by the system.
We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your understanding. Thank you for your consideration.
Best Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
